name: Convergence Compulsion
description:
Convergence Compulsion is an arcade-style, score-attack game that balances thinking fast and planning ahead. Converge on the wave that matches your color. Explode into a new color. Get points, earn power-ups, and blast your way to a high score!

Move quickly, or you'll get consumed by the wrong wave! But don't stray too far, or you'll never get back for that matching color! Each time you match, an obstacle appears, and after you string more matches together, you'll get power-ups!

Other Key Features

  • High Score Tracking and Leaderboards. Face off against your friends—and the world—as you vie for the highest of high scores!
  • Achievements and Local Stat Tracking. More than scores, you can see and celebrate your lifetime gameplay accomplishments as well as your best moments!
  • Keyboard, Gamepad, Mouse, and Touch Support. Play how you like! And it gets better...
  • Remappable Controls. You can configure the controls for keyboard and gamepad. You want WASD? You got it! Would you rather use a D-pad? Go for it!
  • Configurable Colors. You can choose your own colors to converge on from the OPTIONS > COLORS menu.
